thread.section_title: Vital Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vital Choice | vitalchoice.com | 5 of 274
thread.title: Delighted Customer
thread.title_full: Vital Choice reviewed by Delighted Customer

author: Delighted Customer
title: Delighted Customer
text:
The food always arrives on time and well packaged. It is delicious, too! My current favorite is the garlic flowers...I put it on my salads and add in into everything I cook. True flavor and aroma...a real treat.
The website works easily and well, too.
The only two places I shop are Vital Choice and Amazon!!
